channel.title: Please read this
channel.description: Hello guys, I'm looking for an answer to a question. What should I start learning about hacking first? I enjoy hacking, for example. I recently made my own home network and tried to hack it, but I definitely don't know a lot of things and I'm looking for an answer to the question where to start. If you have any good links where things are well explained, I would be very happy if you would share them. Or some classic character advice is fine, for anything new I will be happy to learn. Thank you in advance.

item.title: Please read this
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 121 days. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Please read this
item.dc:creator: mrx
item.description:
Hello guys,
I’m looking for an answer to a question. What should I start learning about hacking first? I enjoy hacking, for example. I recently made my own home network and tried to hack it, but I definitely don’t know a lot of things and I’m looking for an answer to the question where to start. If you have any good links where things are well explained, I would be very happy if you would share them. Or some classic character advice is fine, for anything new I will be happy to learn. Thank you in advance.
